publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Psalms 81
ab.l: Č́eb́ar avaz ḱot́uŕuv́č́uǵa gitit üśt́uńa Asafḥa miźmor. Sarnajyz Tenriǵa ki oldur ḱuč́umuź maḥtav qyčḥyryjyz Teńrisińa Jaʿaqovnun.
Ḱot́uŕujuź maḥtav da b́erijiź taf qobuz byla č́eb́ar qyǯaḥ byla.
Tartyjyz janɣyj- da byrɣyɣa biĺgili ḥyǯ ḱuńuḿuźd́a.
Ki ŕesim Jiš́raʾeĺǵa ol t́oŕa Teńrisińa Jaʿaqovnun.
Šarajat Josefḱa qojdu čyḥqa- nynda jeri üśt́uńa Mićriniń śoź ki biĺḿadim any ešit́tim.
Ket́ardim juk ḱot́urḿakt́ań javrunun uvučlary č́oĺḿak iš́- ĺaḿakt́ań aštylar.
Tar bolɣanda čaɣyrdyj maja da qutḥardym śeni qaruv b́erdim saja jašyrtynlyḥ byla qaltravuḥ byla synadym śeni suvlary qatyna Merivanyn hamḿeš́a.
Tynlaɣyn ulusum da tanyḥ e- tajim śeńd́a Jiš́raʾeĺ eǵer tynlasej maja.
Bolmasyn saja jat teńri da bašurmaɣyn öźǵa teńriǵa.
Ḿeń H Teńrij śeniń ol čyɣaruvču śeni jerińd́ań Mićriniń keńartkiń avzujnu da toltururmyn any.
Da tynlamady ulusum śoźuḿa da Jiš́raʾeĺ kĺaḿadi tynlama maja.
Da ijdim any t́erślikĺari byla juŕakĺariniń barsynlar keńaš́ĺari byla.
Eǵer Jiš́raʾeĺ ulusum tynlasajedi maja Jiš́raʾeĺ jollarym byla barsajediĺar.
Az zamandan dušmanlaryn synyḥtyrɣajedim da tar b́eŕuv́č́u- ĺari üśt́uńa qajttyrɣajedim ḥyššymymny.
Dušmanlary H-nyn synyḥ- qajediĺar anar da bolɣajedim birǵaĺarińa dunjaɣa dejiń.
Da b́eśĺagaje- dim alarny naḿetińd́ań budajnyn da qajadan čyjbal tojdurɣajedim any.
